_comment: United Arab Emirates and GCC (Gulf Cooperation Council) compliance norms and standards database. Includes ESMA, TRA, CITC, G-Mark and GCC-wide regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Emirates Authority for Standardization and Metrology - Conformity Assessment
norms.applies_to: Regulated products under ESMA scope (electronics, construction, toys, cosmetics)
norms.description: Mandatory conformity assessment for products on ESMA regulated list. Certificate of Conformity (CoC) required before import. Testing at accredited labs. Covers low voltage equipment, toys, cosmetics, construction products, textiles.

norms.name: ESMA Quality Mark
norms.description: Product certification scheme. Type testing, factory inspection, ongoing surveillance. EQM mark indicates compliance with UAE/GCC standards. Required for certain product categories.

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT Equipment - Safety (UAE Standard)
norms.description: UAE adoption of IEC 62368-1. Hazard-based safety standard for ICT equipment. Required for ESMA certification of IT products.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety (UAE Standard)
norms.description: UAE adoption of IEC 60335-1. General safety requirements for household appliances. Required for ESMA certification.

norms.name: Telecommunications and Digital Government Regulatory Authority - Type Approval
norms.description: Mandatory type approval for telecom and radio equipment in UAE. Testing at TDRA-recognized labs. Type approval certificate required before import or sale. Covers WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, all radio devices.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Requirements (UAE)
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 2.0 W/kg averaged over 10g of tissue. Testing required for handheld devices. Part of TDRA type approval process.

norms.name: GSO Standards - GCC-Wide Technical Regulations
norms.description: GCC-wide technical regulations. Harmonized standards for GCC member states (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, Oman). Mandatory in member states. Covers various product categories.

norms.name: GSO Technical Regulation for Low Voltage Equipment
norms.description: GCC low voltage equipment regulation. Based on IEC standards. Safety requirements. Mandatory across GCC states. CoC required.

norms.name: GSO Electromagnetic Compatibility Regulation
norms.description: GCC EMC requirements. Emission and immunity. Based on IEC standards. Mandatory across GCC. Testing at accredited labs.

norms.name: GSO Restriction of Hazardous Substances
norms.description: GCC RoHS regulation. Restricts lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBBs, PBDEs, phthalates. Similar to EU RoHS. Compliance required for EEE in GCC.

norms.name: GSO Technical Regulation for Toys Safety
norms.description: GCC toy safety regulation. Comprehensive safety requirements. Based on ISO 8124. Mechanical, chemical, flammability. Mandatory certification for toys in GCC.

norms.name: Gulf Mark for Product Conformity
norms.description: GCC conformity mark (G-Mark). Indicates compliance with GSO technical regulations. Recognized across GCC states. Factory inspection and testing required.

norms.name: Communications, Space and Technology Commission - Saudi Arabia Type Approval
norms.applies_to: Telecommunications and radio equipment in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: Mandatory type approval for Saudi market. Testing at CITC-accredited labs. Certificate required before customs clearance. Covers all radio and telecom equipment.

norms.name: Saudi Standards, Metrology and Quality Organization - Product Conformity
norms.description: SASO conformity assessment. SALEEM platform for registration. Pre-shipment CoC or shipment-based CoC. Testing to Saudi/GSO standards. Mandatory for customs clearance.

norms.name: Saudi Energy Efficiency Standards and Labeling
norms.applies_to: Appliances, electronics, lighting, HVAC in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency standards and labeling. SEEC (Saudi Energy Efficiency Center) program. Star rating label. MEPS for various products. Registration required.

norms.name: Saudi Food and Drug Authority - Medical Device Registration
norms.description: Medical device registration with SFDA. Classification based on risk. Pre-market approval. QMS requirements. Local authorized representative required.

norms.name: Kuwait Type Approval Committee - Telecom Equipment
norms.description: Type approval for telecom equipment in Kuwait. CITRA (Communication and Information Technology Regulatory Authority) oversight. Testing and certification required.

norms.name: Public Authority for Industry - Kuwait Product Conformity
norms.applies_to: Industrial and consumer products in Kuwait
norms.description: Conformity assessment for products. Testing to Kuwaiti/GSO standards. Certificate of Conformity required. Covers various product categories.

norms.name: Communications Regulatory Authority - Qatar Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for telecom and radio equipment in Qatar. CRA approval required. Testing at recognized labs. Certificate for customs clearance.

norms.name: Qatar General Organization for Standards - Product Conformity
norms.description: Conformity assessment with QS (Qatar Standards). Testing to Qatari/GSO standards. Certificate of Conformity. Pre-shipment or shipment-based.

norms.name: Telecommunications Regulatory Authority - Bahrain Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for telecom equipment in Bahrain. TRA approval and registration. Testing requirements. Certificate required.

norms.name: National Bureau for Standards and Quality - Bahrain Conformity
norms.description: Conformity assessment with NBSQ. Testing to Bahraini/GSO standards. Certificate of Conformity. Quality Mark scheme available.

norms.name: Telecommunications Regulatory Authority - Oman Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for telecom equipment in Oman. TRA Oman approval. Testing at approved labs. Type approval certificate required.

norms.name: Ministry of Commerce and Industry - Oman Product Conformity
norms.description: Conformity assessment for products. Testing to Omani/GSO standards. Certificate of Conformity. Mandatory for customs clearance.

norms.name: UAE Customs Tariff and HS Classification
norms.description: HS-based customs classification. Determines duties, regulatory requirements. Customs clearance requires relevant certifications (ESMA, TRA, etc.).

norms.name: Dubai Municipality - Health and Safety Approvals
norms.applies_to: Food contact materials, cosmetics, certain consumer products in Dubai
norms.description: Dubai Municipality approvals for specific products. Food contact materials, cosmetics, detergents. Testing and registration. Additional to ESMA requirements.

norms.name: Ministry of Interior - Vehicle Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for vehicles. GCC type approval or UAE-specific approval. Homologation requirements. ESMA coordination. Safety and emissions standards.

norms.name: Abu Dhabi Quality and Conformity Council
norms.description: Quality and conformity requirements specific to Abu Dhabi. Coordination with ESMA. Additional testing or approvals may be required for certain products.

norms.name: Consumer Protection Law - Federal Law No. 15/2020
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Product safety, information, recalls, warranties. Ministry of Economy enforcement. Product liability provisions.

norms.name: Product Liability and Recall Requirements
norms.description: Liability for defective products. Mandatory recall procedures. Public notification. Ministry of Economy oversight. Penalties for non-compliance.

norms.name: Federal Data Protection Law - Federal Decree-Law No. 45/2021
norms.description: Comprehensive data protection law. Consent requirements, data subject rights, security measures, breach notification. Similar principles to GDPR. Applies to connected devices and services.

norms.name: Cybersecurity Standards and Regulations
norms.applies_to: Critical infrastructure, government systems, connected devices
norms.description: Cybersecurity requirements for critical infrastructure and government. NCEMA (National Emergency Crisis and Disasters Management Authority) standards. Incident reporting. Security controls.

norms.name: Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority - Cybersecurity Framework
norms.applies_to: Financial services and fintech in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: Cybersecurity framework for financial sector. Applies to fintech products and services. Security controls, risk management, incident response.

norms.name: IoT Security Framework - Saudi Arabia
norms.description: IoT security guidelines and emerging requirements. CITC oversight. Security by design, vulnerability management, secure updates. Evolving regulatory landscape.

norms.name: Food Safety Requirements - Federal and Emirates Level
norms.applies_to: Food products and food contact materials
norms.description: Food safety requirements. Federal food safety law plus emirate-specific requirements (Dubai Municipality, Abu Dhabi Food Control). Registration, labeling, testing.

norms.name: Product Labeling Requirements - Arabic Language
norms.description: Mandatory labeling in Arabic. Product information, warnings, usage instructions, importer details. English permitted as additional language. ESMA requirements.

norms.name: GSO Nutritional Labeling Standard
norms.description: GCC-wide nutritional labeling requirements. Format, mandatory declarations, health claims. Harmonized across GCC states.

norms.name: Halal Product Requirements
norms.applies_to: Food products and products with food-grade ingredients
norms.description: Halal certification requirements vary by GCC state. Generally required for food products. Approved certifying bodies. Slaughter requirements, ingredients, processing.

norms.name: Saudi Food and Drug Authority - Halal Requirements
norms.description: Halal certification mandatory for food products. SFDA-approved certifying bodies. Specific slaughter requirements for meat. Import requirements.

norms.name: Ministry of Health - Pharmaceutical and Medical Registration
norms.description: Registration with MoHAP (Ministry of Health and Prevention). Pharmaceuticals, medical devices, cosmetics. Good Manufacturing Practice. Pre-market approval.

norms.name: Dubai Health Authority - Healthcare Product Approvals
norms.description: DHA approvals for healthcare products in Dubai. Medical devices, pharmaceuticals. Coordination with federal MoHAP. Additional Dubai-specific requirements.

norms.name: Environmental Protection and Climate Change Requirements
norms.description: Environmental requirements. Ministry of Climate Change and Environment. Chemical registration, waste management, hazardous materials. Affects product materials and disposal.

norms.name: UAE Net Zero and Sustainability Initiatives
norms.applies_to: Products with environmental impact (voluntary but emerging requirements)
norms.description: UAE Net Zero 2050 and green agenda. Emerging sustainability requirements. Energy efficiency, carbon footprint, circular economy. Voluntary programs becoming expectations.

norms.name: Saudi Green Initiative and Environmental Standards
norms.applies_to: Products with environmental impact in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: Saudi environmental initiatives. Emerging sustainability requirements. Energy efficiency, circular economy. Aligns with Vision 2030. Evolving regulatory landscape.

norms.name: GCC Customs Union and Tariff
norms.description: GCC customs union. Common external tariff (generally 5% with exceptions). Harmonized HS classification. Free movement within GCC after initial customs clearance.

norms.name: Commercial Agency Law and Distribution
norms.description: Commercial agency regulations. Local agent/distributor requirements for foreign companies. Exclusive distribution. Affects product import and distribution arrangements.

norms.name: UAE Trademark and Patent Protection
norms.description: IP protection in UAE. Trademark registration, patent protection, design registration. Ministry of Economy. Enforcement against counterfeits. Important for brand protection.

norms.name: Saudi Authority for Intellectual Property
norms.applies_to: Product branding and innovation in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: IP protection in Saudi Arabia. SAIP (Saudi Authority for Intellectual Property) registration. Trademarks, patents, designs. Enforcement mechanisms.

norms.name: Legal Metrology and Weights & Measures
norms.description: Legal metrology requirements. ESMA enforcement. Net content declaration. Verification of measuring instruments. Tolerances for packaged goods.

norms.name: Legal Metrology - Saudi Arabia
norms.applies_to: Prepackaged goods, measuring instruments in Saudi Arabia
norms.description: Legal metrology requirements. SASO enforcement. Net quantity, verification of measuring instruments. Pre-packaging regulations.

norms.name: Occupational Health and Safety Standards
norms.description: Workplace safety requirements. Ministry of Human Resources standards. Affects machinery, electrical equipment, PPE. Employer obligations.
